alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Franklin; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 12:17AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm outflow winds will impact portions of southwestern Madison, northern Franklin, northern Crawford and southeastern Washington Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1216 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorm outflow winds along a line extending from 2 miles southwest of Greenland to Japton. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Cedarville... Mountainburg... Natural Dam... Farmington... Prairie Grove... Elkins... West Fork... Greenland... Winslow... Chester... St. Paul... Wesley... Saint Paul... Devils Den State Park... Brentwood... Lake Fort Smith... Strickler... Drake Field Airport... Cass... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 27 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for northwestern Arkansas.
